title: What are some pieces of ethereal ambient music? - Quora

response.answer_text: While ambient music isn’t really my forte, I am familiar with aural sonicscapes (think Grateful Dead “Space”/“jam” or Pink Floyd early days, as well as electronica). You should refer to the work of people like Brian Eno (who coined the phrase “ambient music”, I believe), Laurie Anderson, Peter Gabriel, Paul Oaks, even some Moby.

If you want ethereal sounds, I recommend a prolific artist named Poemme. poemme on soundcloud Poemme on Spotify poemme on Bandcamp I listen to a lot of ambient music, and collect my favourites in my radio show, but I tend to like mysterious, darker stuff.  Radio Pure is my monthly ambient radio show.
